snippet.title: Swift 4: Collage App - How to Generate Images and Share with UIActivityViewController (Ep 3)
snippet.description:
Today we will generate images from our UIViewController view object and share it using UIActivityViewController.  Some of the code involved in creating our image requires rendering in an Image Context which we will look at briefly.  Finally we fix our popover presentation for the iPad device by specifying a barButtonItem property.

Source Code Download
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course_video?id=1552
